title: Did a 1990 Comic Depict Trump Coming to Power and Building a Wall?
subtitle: A 27-year-old comic strip by Peter Kuper received renewed interest on social media in 2017.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A July 1990 comic strip in Heavy Metal magazine featured a controversial wall in New York City, built by Donald Trump, and a populist "rise to power" by the future president.
